entry.content:
This project haven't have any piece of code writen yet

Why making another wheel

The current web framework have the following pitfalls 1. poor inherience .. modules cannot be modified/overwrite .. code reuse is hard 2. Javascript/ CSS are not tied to framework

Design Criterias

  • Can be done
  • Can address using id or div with property

Optional: * Integrate with React

Implementation

  • Using python with context management to implement template engine
  • Beautiful Soup html generation
  • Reuse native python class for inheritece (C3 Linerization is the main reason)
  • bintree module for moudle rewrite and/or
